name: Jordan Thompson
bio:
Jordan Thompson, also known as "Troublesome," is a rising star in the world of boxing. Born on June 7, 1993, Thompson has quickly made a name for himself with his impressive skills and intimidating presence in the ring.

Standing at an incredible height of 198cm, Thompson towers over his opponents, using his long reach to his advantage. With a reach of 198cm, he is able to keep his opponents at a distance, making it difficult for them to land clean shots.

Thompson is an orthodox fighter, meaning he leads with his left hand and right foot. This stance allows him to generate maximum power and accuracy in his punches. Combined with his height and reach, Thompson's stance makes him a formidable opponent in the cruiserweight division.

In terms of weight, Thompson currently competes in the cruiserweight class, which has a weight limit of 90.72kg. This weight class suits him well, as he possesses the strength and endurance necessary to excel in this division.

With over 20 years of boxing experience, Thompson has honed his skills and developed a style that is difficult to beat. He combines technical precision with explosive power, making him a force to be reckoned with in the ring.

Thompson's nickname, "Troublesome," reflects his ability to disrupt his opponents' game plans and create chaos in the ring. He has a knack for finding openings in his opponents' defense and capitalizing on them with swift and powerful combinations.

One of Thompson's biggest strengths is his ability to adapt and adjust his strategy mid-fight. He has a keen sense of timing and is quick to recognize patterns in his opponents' movements. This allows him to make the necessary adjustments to exploit their weaknesses and come out on top.

Thompson is known for his explosive knockout power, as well as his remarkable chin. He has the ability to deliver devastating punches that can end a fight in an instant. His opponents know they are in for a tough battle when they step into the ring with him.

Outside of the ring, Thompson is a humble and down-to-earth individual. He is dedicated to his craft and works tirelessly to improve his skills. Thompson is always looking for new ways to push himself and stay ahead of the competition.

As Thompson continues to ascend the ranks of the boxing world, his presence is sure to be felt. With his combination of size, skill, and determination, he is a force to be reckoned with in the cruiserweight division. Fans can expect to see many exciting fights and incredible knockouts from this talented boxer.

Whether you love him or hate him, there is no denying that Jordan Thompson is a rising star in the world of boxing. His height, reach, and explosive power make him a formidable opponent in the cruiserweight division. With his adaptability and keen sense of timing, Thompson has what it takes to dominate the ring. Keep an eye on this "Troublesome" boxer as he continues to make his mark in the sport.
